pull.title: qt6, test: Handle deprecated code
pull.body:
Split from https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/30997.

This PR ensures compatibility across all supported Qt versions.

---

This PR can be tested on macOS using the first commit from https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/30997 and Homebrew's `qt` package.

repo.name: gui
repo.description: Bitcoin Core GUI staging repository. Please do not fork unless for development reasons.

verification.payload:
tree a8325561f4a84db63ee272bfb6ff7c9060992170
parent d812cf11896a2214467b6fa72d7b763bac6077c5
author Hennadii Stepanov <32963518+hebasto@users.noreply.github.com> 1727616008 +0100
committer Hennadii Stepanov <32963518+hebasto@users.noreply.github.com> 1727616008 +0100

qt6, test: Use `qWarning()` instead of `QWARN()` macro

The `QWARN()` macro internally uses `QTest::qWarn()`, which has been
deprecated since Qt 6.3. Replacing it with `qWarning()` ensures
compatibility across all Qt versions.

events.message:
qt6, test: Use `qWarning()` instead of `QWARN()` macro

The `QWARN()` macro internally uses `QTest::qWarn()`, which has been
deprecated since Qt 6.3. Replacing it with `qWarning()` ensures
compatibility across all Qt versions.

events.message:
qt6, test: Handle deprecated `QVERIFY_EXCEPTION_THROWN`

This change ensures compatibility across all supported Qt versions.

Co-Authored-By: JoÃ£o Barbosa <joao.paulo.barbosa@gmail.com>

events.body:
tACK 5625840c11db2065a1c8d8de3babb6466eda04d4

I only tested on Intel macOS 15.0 with Homebrew qt@5. Checked that the warnings still appear with `build/src/qt/test/test_bitcoin-qt`.

comments.body:
2b5fd8fd24026ecf2fac7af6657e2363bfe3706c

An alternative to reduce duplicate code and the diff is to define `QVERIFY_EXCEPTION_THROWN`, something like?

```cpp
// handle deprecated macro, can be removed once minimum Qt is at least 6.3.0
#if (QT_VERSION >= QT_VERSION_CHECK(6, 3, 0))
#define QVERIFY_EXCEPTION_THROWN(a, b) QVERIFY_THROWS_EXCEPTION(b, a)
#endif
```

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -127,6 +127,11 @@ void RPCNestedTests::rpcNestedTests()
     RPCConsole::RPCExecuteCommandLine(m_node, result, "rpcNestedTest(   abc   ,   cba )");
     QVERIFY(result == "[\"abc\",\"cba\"]");
 
+// Handle deprecated macro, can be removed once minimum Qt is at least 6.3.0.
+#if (QT_VERSION >= QT_VERSION_CHECK(6, 3, 0))
+#undef QVERIFY_EXCEPTION_THROWN
+#define QVERIFY_EXCEPTION_THROWN(expression, exceptiontype) QVERIFY_THROWS_EXCEPTION(exceptiontype, expression)
